title: In the mind of a murderer Pt.1
brief_description: The first part of a documentary that examines the case of the “Hillside Strangler”. The search, by police, to track down the strangler is covered and interviews with police, psychologists and lawyers are included. The suspected culprit is believed to suffer from a multiple personalities disorder and this issue is discussed by the experts.
